DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria－Nonpathologic young adult ( 1828 year old ) nonpathologic adult ( 2980 year old ) 1 . Male female subject 18 80 year old full legal capacity volunteer date inform consent sign ; 2 . Subjects follow instruction clinical staff clinical site , attend examination schedule examination date ; 3 . Subjects agree participate study . Inclusion Criteria －Pathologic adult ( 2980 year old ) : 1 . Male female subject 29 80 year old full legal capacity volunteer date inform consent sign ; 2 . Subjects follow instruction clinical staff clinical site , attend examination schedule examination date ; 3 . Subjects agree participate study ; 4 . At least one eye follow condition : 1 . History postop surgical trauma include pseudophakic aphakic bullous keratopathy 2 . History corneal transplant 3 . Physical injury trauma cornea 4 . Fuch 's dystrophy , Guttata corneal endothelial dystrophy 5 . Keratoconus 6 . Longterm polymethyl methacrylate ( PMMA ) contact lens use ( great 3 year ) . Exclusion Criteria Nonpathologic young adult ( 1828 year old ) nonpathologic adult ( 2980 year old ) 1 . History postop surgical trauma include bullous keratopathy ; 2 . History corneal transplant ; 3 . Evidence physical injury trauma cornea ; 4 . Fuch 's dystrophy , Guttata corneal endothelial dystrophy ; 5 . Keratoconus ; 6 . Longterm PMMA contact lens use ( great 3 year ) ; 7 . History cataract , refractive ocular surgical procedure render cornea opaque otherwise impact ability image use investigational device ; 8 . Fixation problem may prevent obtain good Tomey EM4000 Konan CellChek XL image either eye . Exclusion Criteria Pathologic adult ( 2980 year old ) 1 . History cataract , refractive ocular surgical procedure render cornea opaque otherwise impact ability image use investigational device ; 2 . Fixation problem may prevent obtain least poor quality Tomey EM4000 Konan CellChek XL image either eye .
